模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.controller

类 Control_Setting

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Setting
public class Control_Setting extends Object
The Control_Setting class manages the settings interface in the game, including toggling background music and explosion sound effects, and handling the close functionality for the settings window.

  • 字段概要

  • 字段详细资料

    • bgToggle

      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox bgToggle
      A checkbox to toggle the background music on or off. This allows the user to enable or disable the background music during gameplay.

    • gsToggle

      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox gsToggle
      A checkbox to toggle the explosion sound effect on or off. This allows the user to enable or disable the explosion sound effect during gameplay.

    • closeButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button closeButton
      The button that allows the user to close the application. This button exits the game or closes the current view.

    • mainRoot

      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot
      The root container of the main user interface. This container holds all UI components for the main screen.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Control_Setting

      public Control_Setting()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the settings interface by adding event listeners and setting the initial values of the toggle switches based on the current settings.

    • addHoverSoundToButton

      private void addHoverSoundToButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Adds a hover sound effect to the specified button.
      参数:
      button - The button to add the hover sound effect to.

    • toggleBackgroundMusic

      private void toggleBackgroundMusic(boolean play)
      Toggles the background music on or off based on the provided boolean value.
      参数:
      play - If true, background music is enabled; if false, background music is paused.

    • toggleExplosionSound

      private void toggleExplosionSound(boolean play)
      Toggles the explosion sound effect on or off based on the provided boolean value.
      参数:
      play - If true, explosion sound is enabled; if false, explosion sound is disabled.

    • setMainRoot

      public void setMainRoot(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot)
      Sets the root container of the main interface to remove the blur effect when closing the settings window.
      参数:
      mainRoot - The root container of the main interface.

    • closeSettings

      private void closeSettings()
      Closes the settings window and removes the blur effect from the main interface.
